description:
Welcome to the crash course on JavaScript.

This course is a quick revision of all essential components in JavaScript. All concepts are explained in a very detailed manner so that you can get most of it. If you are new to Javascript and want to learn the basics then, this course is for you. I have structured this course in such a way that a newbie can learn each and everything.

No scripting knowledge is required to start this course. I will teach you writing your first Javascript in the course. All the material is in video format.

You can ask me any of your doubt through discussion area, and I'll help you for sure.
title: JavaScript : Beginner's guide to JavaScript
